column5: Had a couple errands to do in town and had to go look at the lake.Got to admit it looks pretty awesome.
Full blown winter there,and winter storm now in my city!
It ain't over till the fat lady sings.
Plenty of them around to do the singing.
True.Last spring it was April 26 when Cliff Lake gave me a mile and half of open water and Muskie Bay was open.Felt good to finally float on water rather than stand on it.
My preferred conveyance on the water is my boat vs my feet!
Actually mine to.But when you have ice for 5 months and like fishing you have to take advantage of it.Plus it's pretty enjoyable if you pick the right days
When your pounding them through the ice,in my mind nothing better than that!
